title: Topic 004 Question 051
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains an Azure App Service web app named WebApp1 and an Azure Front Door profile named FDProfile1. FDProfile1 forwards requests addressed to https://www.contoso.com to WebApp1.
You need to ensure that only requests addressed to https://www.contoso.com/users/* are forwarded to WebApp1.
What should you modify in FDProfile1?
